92638.「バトル中 特定の条件を満たすと\n バトル終了後にもらえる コロシアム名声値に:
If you meet certain conditions during a battle, you'll receive a bonus to your Colosseum Fame value at the end of the
battle. The first condition is to be the first to get points... If you get the points before anyone else in your party, you'll
get... The second requirement is to be the last to get points... The second requirement is to be the last one in your party to get
the point. If you meet each of these requirements, you will receive a bonus...

92639.「バトルマップに 移動後 ３０秒間の\n 自由時間が用意され なかまとの相談や\:
Once you're on the battle map, you'll have 30 seconds of free time to talk to your friends, change your equipment, and more. You can also
use the main command to view information about your opponent's party... You can use this information to plan your strategy...

92640.「コロシアムバトル中は\n 通常のモンスターとのバトルと異なる\n いくつかの:
During a Colosseum battle, there are a few restrictions that make it different from a normal battle with monsters... You can't use
weapons... Skills learned in other professions and effects that increase parameters are disabled... There are also
restrictions on some skills that should be available in your current profession, such as not being able to use them or changing their
effects... Also, when a battle begins, the base value of your maximum HP is doubled... You can check the base value of your maximum
HP from the Strength parameter...

92641.「バトルが始まると 画面上部に 残り時間と\n パーティの合計ポイント。画面左上:
At the top of the screen, you'll see the time remaining and your party's total points. At the top left of the screen, you can see how
many points each player has. The icons above each player's head indicate how many points they have... The more prominent the icon, the
more points you have, so...

92642.「バトル準備完了後 バトルが終わる前に\n バトルから 抜けてしまった場合\n:
If you leave a battle before it's over, you'll lose the battle. And as a penalty, you will not be able to enter Colosseum Battles
for a certain amount of time... If you leave a battle due to a communication error, your points will be divided between your party and
your party members... If you recover from a communication error and return to battle, you'll be restarted with zero points, but you
won't be penalized...

92643.「ポイントとは バトルの勝敗を 決める\n コロシアム専用の 機能です。\n<b:
Points are the exclusive weapon of the Coliseum that determines who wins and who loses the battle. The higher your level, the
more points you start with, but the higher your party's total, the more points you earn. The only way to get those points is to defeat
your opponent. If you defeat them, you get half the points they had. However, if your defeated opponent is revived, the points you
took will be returned to your opponent. You can also interfere with your opponent's revival... And at the end of the battle, the
party with the highest point total wins.

92644.「ランクは コロシアムでの強さを示します。\n バトル終了時に獲得する『コロシア:
Rank indicates your strength in the Colosseum... You gain Colosseum Experience at the end of battles, and by accumulating it,
your rank will increase. While you're at a lower rank, you'll gain Colosseum Experience even if you lose, but at a higher rank,
you'll lose it... If you're ready to move up in rank, you'll need to contact me, and I'll arrange for you to be upgraded, and you'll be
rewarded according to your rank. Of course, if your Colosseum experience drops below a certain level, you may be downgraded. Your
rank is reset every major update, so if you talk to me, you'll start at a rank closer to your last rank. Please note that if you have
not participated in any official battles up to and including the latest one, your rank will be greatly reduced. If you've received a
Rank Up Reward, it will be reset and you won't be able to receive it again... If you would like to check your Rank Up Reward,
please refer to "Rank Up Reward" in the reception area... You'll also earn more experience if you beat a higher-ranked
opponent or meet certain conditions during battle...

92645.「バトルは ４対４のパーティバトル限定です。\n ３分間 互いのパーティが持つポ:
The battle is limited to 4-on-4 party battles, where players compete for each other's points for 3 minutes in a heated battle for points!
Coliseumbattle will start with everyone having 100 points, and if you defeat an opponent during the battle, half of his points will be
added to your points. If the player is revived within approximately 20 seconds of being defeated, the stolen points are returned to
the original player and the player who revived him or her. If the player is not revived on the spot, he or she moves to the resurrection
point and returns to the battle. The party with the higher point total at the end of the battle wins. If there is a tie, the party with
more points wins. Please cooperate with everyone to achieve victory! Finally, Nearby Chat and Party Chat are only allowed in
practice battles. In order to ensure a pleasant experience, please do not say anything that your opponent may not like,
regardless of whether it is inside or outside of Coliseum. You will be penalized depending on what you say. If you are harassed by
someone's comments, please report it from the "Troubleshooting" page. If you are harassed by someone, please report it from the "What to do
if you are in trouble?

92646.<select_se_off>\nバトルグランプリについて\nフリーバトルについ:
<select_se_off>
About Battle Grand Prix
About Free Battles
<select_end><break>

92647.「練習バトルとは ランキングや\n ランクに影響しない バトルです。\n 個人成:
Practice battles are battles that don't affect your ranking, your rank... It also doesn't affect your personal score. If one
party selects "Enter and Wait," and the other party selects "Select Opponent," they can select from a list of opponents... You can
also choose to battle with a party of three or less... If you're searching for an opponent automatically, you'll be
automatically assigned a party just like in official battles... And for practice battles only, there are no level restrictions, so
anyone can join...

92648.「『公式バトル』とは 必ず ４人対４人で戦う\n 本気の コロシアムバトルです！:
The Official Battle is a serious coliseum battle between four players against four players! You must be at least level 90 to
participate. If you don't have four friends when you enter, the missing members will be automatically chosen for you. Your opponent
will also be automatically selected... If you have friends, only the party leader may enter. At this point, your friends will be
asked to confirm their participation in the Colosseum Battle... In Official Battles, you'll earn Coliseum experience,
participation prizes, and your personal results will be reflected... Official Battles will not be available during the Battle Grand
Prix...

92649.「どの項目について ご説明いたしましょうか。\n<break>:
Which of these items would you like me to
explain to you?<break>

92650.「現在 コロシアムは プレオープン期間中です。\n 皆様から ご意見をいただき:
The Coliseum is currently in its pre-opening period... The Coliseum is currently in its pre-opening period, and we'd like to hear
your feedback so we can make it even more enjoyable. As a special prize, we'll be giving out one lucky draw ticket per day...
Please note that your score data from the pre-opening period will be reset when the official grand opening...

92651.「コロシアムランキングとは\n 『ワールドおしらせ板』から確認できる\n コロシ:
Colosseum Ranking is a ranking for Colosseum that can be checked from the "World Notice Board". The top 100 players by profession
will be listed in the Colosseum Rankings! During the current pre-opening, the "Most Voted Player Ranking" will compete for the
number of player votes at the end of the battle... The Colosseum Rankings will be updated four times a day, every six hours...
You can check it out from the Awakened Adventurer's Square...

92663.「コロシアムとは 世界中から集まった\n ウデじまんの猛者たちが 互いの技を競い:
The Colosseum is a place where fierce fighters from all over the world compete against each other to reach the top! The
battle is a four-on-four par... For a certain amount of time, each party will be competing for points, and the one with the most points
will win! You can enter battles by yourself or with your friends in the Official Battles or Practice Battles... When you win an
Official Battle, you'll gain Colosseum experience and your Rank will rise... There are special rewards for moving up... Your
rank is reset every major update, so if you talk to me, I'll start you off at a rank closer to your last rank... If you haven't
participated in any official battles up until the last one, your rank will be downgraded significantly... In addition to Colosseum
experience, you'll also receive a "piece of glory" for each victory, so try trading it in for an item at the Exchange Shop... The
Colosseum is only open to players of level 90 and above... However, practice battles are open to all levels...

113704.「バトル中 特定の条件を満たすと\n バトル終了後にもらえる コロシアム名声値に:
If you meet certain conditions during a battle, you'll receive a bonus to your Colosseum Fame value at the end of the
battle. The first condition is to be the first to get points... If you get the points before anyone else in your party, you'll
get... The second requirement is to be the last to get points... The second requirement is to be the last one in your party to get
the point. If you meet each of these requirements, you will receive a bonus...

113706.「バトルマップに 移動後 ３０秒間の\n 自由時間が用意され なかまとの相談や\:
Once you're on the battle map, you'll have 30 seconds of free time to talk to your friends, change your equipment, and more. You can also
use the main command to view information about your opponent's party... You can use this information to plan your strategy...

113708.「コロシアムバトル中は\n 通常のモンスターとのバトルと異なる\n いくつかの:
During a Colosseum battle, there are a few restrictions that make it different from a normal battle with monsters... You can't use
weapons... Skills learned in other professions and effects that increase parameters are disabled... There are also
restrictions on some skills that should be available in your current profession, such as not being able to use them or changing their
effects... Also, when a battle begins, the base value of your maximum HP is doubled... You can check the base value of your maximum
HP from the Strength parameter...

113710.「バトルが始まると 画面上部に 残り時間と\n パーティの合計ポイント。画面左上:
At the top of the screen, you'll see the time remaining and your party's total points. At the top left of the screen, you can see how
many points each player has. The icons above each player's head indicate how many points they have... The more prominent the icon, the
more points you have, so...

113712.「バトル準備完了後 バトルが終わる前に\n バトルから 抜けてしまった場合\n:
If you leave a battle before it's over, you'll lose the battle. And as a penalty, you will not be able to enter Colosseum Battles
for a certain amount of time... If you leave a battle due to a communication error, your points will be divided between your party and
your party members... If you recover from a communication error and return to battle, you'll be restarted with zero points, but you
won't be penalized...

113714.「ポイントとは バトルの勝敗を 決める\n コロシアム専用の 機能です。\n<b:
Points are the exclusive weapon of the Coliseum that determines who wins and who loses the battle. The higher your level, the
more points you start with, but the higher your party's total, the more points you earn. The only way to get those points is to defeat
your opponent. If you defeat them, you get half the points they had. However, if your defeated opponent is revived, the points you
took will be returned to your opponent. You can also interfere with your opponent's revival... And at the end of the battle, the
party with the highest point total wins.

113716.「ランクは コロシアムでの強さを示します。\n バトル終了時に獲得する『コロシア:
Rank indicates your strength in the Colosseum... You gain Colosseum Experience at the end of battles, and by accumulating it,
your rank will increase. While you're at a lower rank, you'll gain Colosseum Experience even if you lose, but at a higher rank,
you'll lose it... If you're ready to move up in rank, you'll need to contact me, and I'll arrange for you to be upgraded, and you'll be
rewarded according to your rank. Of course, if your Colosseum experience drops below a certain level, you may be downgraded. Your
rank is reset every major update, so if you talk to me, you'll start at a rank closer to your last rank. Please note that if you have
not participated in any official battles up to and including the latest one, your rank will be greatly reduced. If you've received a
Rank Up Reward, it will be reset and you won't be able to receive it again... If you would like to check your Rank Up Reward,
please refer to "Rank Up Reward" in the reception area... You'll also earn more experience if you beat a higher-ranked
opponent or meet certain conditions during battle...

113718.「バトルは ４対４のパーティバトル限定です。\n ３分間 互いのパーティが持つポ:
The battle is limited to 4-on-4 party battles, where players compete for each other's points for 3 minutes in a heated battle for points!
Coliseumbattle will start with everyone having 100 points, and if you defeat an opponent during the battle, half of his points will be
added to your points. If the player is revived within approximately 20 seconds of being defeated, the stolen points are returned to
the original player and the player who revived him or her. If the player is not revived on the spot, he or she moves to the resurrection
point and returns to the battle. The party with the higher point total at the end of the battle wins. If there is a tie, the party with
more points wins. Please cooperate with everyone to achieve victory! Finally, Nearby Chat and Party Chat are only allowed in
practice battles. In order to ensure a pleasant experience, please do not say anything that your opponent may not like,
regardless of whether it is inside or outside of Coliseum. You will be penalized depending on what you say. If you are harassed by
someone's comments, please report it from the "Troubleshooting" page. If you are harassed by someone, please report it from the "What to do
if you are in trouble?

113722.「練習バトルとは ランキングや\n ランクに影響しない バトルです。\n 個人成:
Practice battles are battles that don't affect your ranking, your rank... It also doesn't affect your personal score. If one
party selects "Enter and Wait," and the other party selects "Select Opponent," they can select from a list of opponents... You can
also choose to battle with a party of three or less... If you're searching for an opponent automatically, you'll be
automatically assigned a party just like in official battles... And for practice battles only, there are no level restrictions, so
anyone can join...

113724.「『公式バトル』とは 必ず ４人対４人で戦う\n 本気の コロシアムバトルです！:
The Official Battle is a serious coliseum battle between four players against four players! You must be at least level 90 to
participate. If you don't have four friends when you enter, the missing members will be automatically chosen for you. Your opponent
will also be automatically selected... If you have friends, only the party leader may enter. At this point, your friends will be
asked to confirm their participation in the Colosseum Battle... In Official Battles, you'll earn Coliseum experience,
participation prizes, and your personal results will be reflected... Official Battles will not be available during the Battle Grand
Prix...

113726.「グランプリランクは バトルグランプリの\n バトル終了時に入手する グランプリ:
Your Grand Prix Rank is based on the amount of Grand Prix Points you earn at the end of each Battle Grand Prix battle. You can earn
more Grand Prix Points by defeating opponents of higher rank than you. You will also receive Rank Up rewards as your Grand Prix
Rank rises. If you'd like to see your Rank Up Rewards, go to the "Rank Up Rewards" section in the reception... Grand Prix Ranks are
reset each Battle Grand Prix, and Rank Up Rewards are also subject to change...

113728.「コロシアムランキングとは\n 『まちかど掲示板』から確認できる\n コロシアム:
The Colosseum Ranking is a ranking system for the Colosseum that you can check from the "Machikado BBS". At the Grand Opening, you'll
be ranked by the number of Grand Prix Points you earn... Data is collected during the Battle Grand Prix... Your data will be reset
when the next Battle Grand Prix is held. At the end of the Battle Grand Prix, the top players in the rankings will be rewarded
with... If you'd like to check your rewards, go to the Town Board, or talk to the receptionist, and select "Ranking Rewards."

113730.「バトルグランプリとは 年に数回 開催され\n ランキングを競い合い アストルテ:
The Battle Grand Prix is a major battle event that is held several times a year to determine the strongest player in Astoltia.
To participate, select "Battle Grand Prix" at the registration desk... The basic rules of battle are the same as the official battle...
During the Battle Grand Prix, you'll earn Grand Prix Points at the end of each battle, and once you've accumulated a certain amount,
your Grand Prix Rank will increase... And the rankings show the top 200 Grand Prix Point earners... At the end of the Battle Grand
Prix, the top players in the rankings will be rewarded with... And the top 100 players in the rankings will be able to rent custom-made
outfits from our coliseum! Finally, please note that your Battle Grand Prix data will be reset at the next...

113733.「コロシアムランキングとは\n 『ワールドおしらせ板』から確認できる\n コロシ:

will be listed in the Colosseum Rankings! During the current pre-opening, the "Most Voted Player Ranking" will compete for the

113770.「コロシアムとは 世界中から集まった\n ウデじまんの猛者たちが 互いの技を競い:
The Colosseum is a place where fierce fighters from all over the world compete against each other to reach the top! The
battle is a four-on-four par... For a certain amount of time, each party will be competing for points, and the one with the most points
will win! You can enter battles by yourself or with your friends in the Official Battles or Practice Battles... When you win an
Official Battle, you'll gain Colosseum experience and your Rank will rise... There are special rewards for moving up... Your
rank is reset every major update, so if you talk to me, I'll start you off at a rank closer to your last rank... If you haven't
participated in any official battles up until the last one, your rank will be downgraded significantly... In addition to Colosseum
experience, you'll also receive a "piece of glory" for each victory, so try trading it in for an item at the Exchange Shop... The
Colosseum is only open to players of level 90 and above... However, practice battles are open to all levels...

113772.「ここからは グランドオープンから入る\n 新しい遊びの説明となります。\n<b:
We're going to start with the grand opening, and then we'll explain the new game... First, all data from the Pre-Open will be reset and
we'll start over... Several times a year, we hold a battle event called the Battle Grand Prix... where players compete to determine
who is the best in Astoltia. During the Battle Grand Prix, official battles will not be available, and you can focus on the Battle
Grand Prix... During this time, you'll earn Grand Prix Points at the end of each battle, and compete for rankings based on how many
points you have... The higher the ranking, the more special rewards will be given... It's going to be a battle with more sparks
than ever before... You can also earn Grand Prix Points to increase your Grand Prix Rank and earn rewards... Push yourself to your
limits! So that's it for now, but we recommend that you check out the full rules by clicking on "Listen"... See you at .....
Sorry to keep you waiting... You've reached the end of the procedure! is now ranked C4 and can participate in the Coliseum! So, without further ado

Welcome to the Colosseum, the social center of battle! We're pleased to announce the reopening of our official battles! I'd like
to explain some of the changes we've made... We've changed the official battle rank designations from F, F+, to C4, C3... Next,
the ranks were never reset, but since the reopening, they've been reset every major update. The first reset after the relaunch
will start you at C4. Also, the reset will occur after you've announced your participation to me, and after that, you'll
start at a rank closer to your last rank... Please note that if you have not participated in any Official Battles up to and including
the latest one, your rank will be greatly reduced... Also, members of the winning team in official battles will now receive a "Shard
of Glory" as a sign of victory... These can be exchanged for items at the Exchange Shop near the reception desk... As with the rank,
it will be reset every time there is a major update, so it is recommended that you exchange it often... Next, about the match
time... The match time used to be 5 minutes, but after the update it will be 3 minutes, so be careful when you use your skills... The
explanation is as follows... I look forward to seeing you at the Coliseum, sir!

285909.<pipipi_mid>\n「戦いの社交場 コロシアムへ ようこそ！\n 現在は:
Welcome to the Coliseum, where the fiercest battles happen! The Battle Grand Prix is currently underway.
The Battle Grand Prix this time is... What's this!?
As a special rule, battles will take place in parties of 6, and each player will begin with an increased 200 points!
I think I'll call it the Battle Grand Prix SP! Please enjoy this special event!
The entry method, Grand Prix Points, and ranking rules are all the same as the regular Battle Grand Prix.
As your Grand Prix Points increase, so too will your rank, earning rewards just as before. So keep on pushing hard!
Lastly, please remember that this event will be treated as solo competition, meaning you cannot enter as a party.
Also, practice battles will be limited to 4 person parties, and official battles will not be available during the event.
That concludes my explanation. I'm looking forward to seeing your passionate participation, !
